pkg.name: header
pkg.title: Header
pkg.description: The Header is the masthead of our applications. It incorporates the Department of Agriculture, Fisheries and Forestry Coat of Arms logo and provides a user context on where they are.

scope.title: Header
scope.description: The Header is the masthead of our applications. It incorporates the Department of Agriculture, Fisheries and Forestry Coat of Arms logo and provides a user context on where they are.

relatedComponents.name: app-layout
relatedComponents.title: App layout
relatedComponents.description: The app layout provides a consistent way for users to navigate around a web application and access their account settings.

relatedComponents.name: main-nav
relatedComponents.title: Main nav
relatedComponents.description: The main nav is the primary way users navigate the user interface. It is consistently visible throughout the service.
